00030 // Required declarations for custom validators *before* including the header,
00031 // otherwise no overloading would happen in standard conforming compilers.
00032 namespace boost { namespace program_options {
00033 
00034 typedef std::vector<std::string> Strings;
00035 typedef std::vector<int64_t> Int64s;
00036 
00037 extern void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, int64_t *, int);
00038 extern void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, int32_t *, int);
00039 extern void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, uint16_t *, int);
00040 
00041 // pre 1.35 vector<T> validate doesn't pickup user defined validate for T
00042 #if BOOST_VERSION < 103500
00043 template<typename T>
00044 void validate(boost::any& v, const Strings &s, std::vector<T>*, int);
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 }} // namespace boost::program_options

00049 #include <boost/program_options.hpp>

00053 
00054 namespace boost { namespace program_options {
00055 
00056 // pre 1.35 vector<T> validate doesn't pickup user defined validate for T
00057 #if BOOST_VERSION < 103500
00058 template<typename T>
00059 void validate(boost::any& v, const Strings &s, std::vector<T>*, int) {
00060   if (v.empty())
00061       v = boost::any(std::vector<T>());
00062 
00063   std::vector<T>* tv = boost::any_cast< std::vector<T> >(&v);
00064   assert(NULL != tv);
00065 
00066   for (unsigned i = 0; i < s.size(); ++i) {
00067     try {
00068       // so we can pick up user defined validate for T here
00069       boost::any a;
00070       Strings sv;
00071       sv.push_back(s[i]);
00072       validate(a, sv, (T*)0, 0);
00073       tv->push_back(boost::any_cast<T>(a));
00074     }
00075     catch(const bad_lexical_cast& /*e*/) {
00076       boost::throw_exception(invalid_option_value(s[i]));
00077     }
00078   }
00079 }
00080 #endif // < boost 1.35
00081 
00082 }} // namespace boost::program_options

00084 // convenience/abbreviated accessors
00085 #define HT_PROPERTIES_ABBR_ACCESSORS \
00086   inline bool get_bool(const String &name) { return get<bool>(name); } \
00087   inline String get_str(const String &name) { return get<String>(name); } \
00088   inline Strings get_strs(const String &name) { return get<Strings>(name); } \
00089   inline uint16_t get_i16(const String &name) { return get<uint16_t>(name); } \
00090   inline int32_t get_i32(const String &name) { return get<int32_t>(name); } \
00091   inline int64_t get_i64(const String &name) { return get<int64_t>(name); } \
00092   inline Int64s get_i64s(const String &name) { return get<Int64s>(name); } \
00093   inline bool get_bool(const String &name, bool default_value) { \
00094     return get(name, default_value); \
00095   } \
00096   inline String get_str(const String &name, const String &default_value) { \
00097     return get(name, default_value); \
00098   } \
00099   inline Strings get_strs(const String &name, const Strings &default_value) { \
00100     return get(name, default_value); \
00101   } \
00102   inline uint16_t get_i16(const String &name, uint16_t default_value) { \
00103     return get(name, default_value); \
00104   } \
00105   inline int32_t get_i32(const String &name, int32_t default_value) { \
00106     return get(name, default_value); \
00107   } \
00108   inline int64_t get_i64(const String &name, int64_t default_value) { \
00109     return get(name, default_value); \
00110   } \
00111   inline Int64s get_i64s(const String &name, const Int64s &default_value) { \
00112     return get(name, default_value); \
00113   }

00124 const uint64_t K = 1000;
00125 const uint64_t KiB = 1024;
00126 const uint64_t M = K * 1000;
00127 const uint64_t MiB = KiB * 1024;
00128 const uint64_t G = M * 1000;
00129 const uint64_t GiB = MiB * 1024;

00134 inline Po::typed_value<Strings> *strs() { return Po::value<Strings>(); }

00142 typedef Po::options_description PropertiesDesc;
00143 typedef Po::positional_options_description PositionalDesc;
00144 
00145 class Properties : public ReferenceCount {
00146   typedef Po::variable_value Value;
00147   typedef Po::variables_map Map;
00148   typedef std::map<String, String> AliasMap;
00149 
00150 public:
00151   Properties() : m_need_alias_sync(false) {}
00152   Properties(const String &filename, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00153              bool allow_unregistered = false)
00154     : m_need_alias_sync(false) { load(filename, desc, allow_unregistered); }
00155 
00163   void load(const String &filename, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00164             bool allow_unregistered = false);
00165 
00175   void
00176   parse_args(int argc, char *argv[], const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00177              const PropertiesDesc *hidden = 0, const PositionalDesc *p = 0);
00178 
00182   void
00183   parse_args(const std::vector<String> &args, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00184              const PropertiesDesc *hidden = 0, const PositionalDesc *p = 0);
00185 
00191   template <typename T>
00192   T get(const String &name) const {
00193     try { return m_map[name].template as<T>(); }
00194     catch (std::exception &e) {
00195       HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_GET_ERROR, "getting value of %s: %s",
00196                 name.c_str(), e.what());
00197     }
00198   }
00199 
00209   template <typename T>
00210   T get(const String &name, const T &default_value) const {
00211     try {
00212       Map::const_iterator it = m_map.find(name);
00213 
00214       if (it != m_map.end())
00215         return (*it).second.template as<T>();
00216 
00217       return default_value;
00218     }
00219     catch (std::exception &e) {
00220       HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_GET_ERROR, "getting value of %s: %s",
00221                 name.c_str(), e.what());
00222     }
00223   }
00224 
00230   const boost::any &operator[](const String &name) const {
00231     return m_map[name].value();
00232   }
00233 
00240   bool defaulted(const String &name) const {
00241     return m_map[name].defaulted();
00242   }
00243 
00244   bool has(const String &name) const { return m_map.count(name); }
00245 
00246   HT_PROPERTIES_ABBR_ACCESSORS
00247 
00255   std::pair<Map::iterator, bool>
00256   add(const String &name, const boost::any &v, bool defaulted = false) {
00257     m_need_alias_sync = true;
00258     return m_map.insert(Map::value_type(name, Value(v, defaulted)));
00259   }
00260 
00268   void set(const String &name, const boost::any &v, bool defaulted = false) {
00269     std::pair<Map::iterator, bool> r = add(name, v, defaulted);
00270 
00271     if (!r.second)
00272       (*r.first).second = Value(v, defaulted);
00273   }
00274 
00283   void alias(const String &primary, const String &secondary,
00284              bool overwrite = false);
00285 
00291   void sync_aliases();
00292 
00299   void print(std::ostream &out, bool include_default = false);
00300 
00304   static String to_str(const boost::any &);
00305 
00306 private:
00307   bool m_need_alias_sync;
00308   Map m_map;
00309   AliasMap m_alias_map;
00310 };

00312 typedef intrusive_ptr<Properties> PropertiesPtr;

00317 class SubProperties {
00318 public:
00319   SubProperties(PropertiesPtr &props, const String &prefix)
00320     : m_props(props), m_prefix(prefix) { }
00321 
00322   String full_name(const String &name) const { return m_prefix + name; }
00323 
00324   template <typename T>
00325   T get(const String &name) const {
00326     return m_props->get<T>(full_name(name));
00327   }
00328 
00329   template <typename T>
00330   T get(const String &name, const T &default_value) const {
00331     return m_props->get(full_name(name), default_value);
00332   }
00333 
00334   bool defaulted(const String &name) const {
00335     return m_props->defaulted(full_name(name));
00336   }
00337 
00338   bool has(const String &name) const {
00339     return m_props->has(full_name(name));
00340   }
00341 
00342   HT_PROPERTIES_ABBR_ACCESSORS
00343 
00344 private:
00345   PropertiesPtr m_props;
00346   String m_prefix;
00347 };
